verses.kjv: Praise ye the LORD. Praise, O ye servants of the LORD, praise the name of the LORD.
verses.ct: Praise the LORD! You who serve the LORD, praise him! Praise the name of the LORD!

verses.kjv: Blessed be the name of the LORD from this time forth and for evermore.
verses.ct: May the name of the LORD be honored now and forever.

verses.kjv: From the rising of the sun unto the going down of the same the LORD’s name is to be praised.
verses.ct: From sunrise to sunset, the name of the LORD deserves to be praised.

verses.kjv: The LORD is high above all nations, and his glory above the heavens.
verses.ct: The LORD is exalted above every nation, and his glory rises above the heavens.

verses.kjv: Who is like unto the LORD our God, who dwelleth on high,
verses.ct: Who can compare to the LORD our God, who is seated on high,

verses.kjv: Who humbleth himself to behold the things that are in heaven, and in the earth!
verses.ct: yet stoops down to look at what happens in heaven and on the earth!

verses.kjv: He raiseth up the poor out of the dust, and lifteth the needy out of the dunghill;
verses.ct: He lifts the poor up from the dirt and raises the needy out of the garbage heap,

verses.kjv: That he may set him with princes, even with the princes of his people.
verses.ct: giving them a seat among leaders — among the leaders of his people.

verses.kjv: He maketh the barren woman to keep house, and to be a joyful mother of children. Praise ye the LORD.
verses.ct: He gives the childless woman a home, making her a happy mother of children. Praise the LORD!
